text: I just visited this Marine Parade branch in Feb 2024. The new staff Xavier is very friendly and sincere. I would rate his service to 5*. My FD has expired for a few days, so I wanted to track my previous interest details. Unexpectedly, his manager was impatient and sounded a bit reproachful as to why I came after the maturity date. This made it difficult for them to track. Isnâ€˜t this an internal bank system problem? Why blame the customers? As a superior, shouldn't she set a good example to train the new staff professionally when dealing with customers? Hence I can only rate 3* for the overall experience.

I would say this bank has rendered the worst customer service I have encountered. Even the manageress in this branch ( Marine Parade ) has very bad working attitude. Look, customers are not here to see your sour face.
